evidence.claim: cancerGO utilizes AWS services for serverless architecture and storage solutions.
The platform maintains HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive patient data.
cancerGO integrates FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
The system provides Webhook integrations for real-time data exchange.
cancerGO makes use of HL7 protocols for healthcare data transmission.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse functions found.
